participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing. She has a passion for music and enjoys sharing her talents with others, especially through teaching.
participant_1.background: I volunteer at the homeless shelter. I enjoy exploring new parts of the city. I play several instruments. My father played violin professionally. I'm a piano teacher on the side.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and friendly. He has a love for animals and enjoys working with his hands, finding joy in both construction and music.
participant_2.background: I'm a construction worker. My cats are very special to me. I've 5 cats. I enjoy building houses.

content.text: Hey! Do you play several instruments?
No, but my cats loves music üê±üê±üê±üê±üê±
